item.title: Fraud Transaction detection
item.description: For this example project I built a Fraud Transaction model with the help of own generate Dataset . This could be useful for someone who is new to Financial domain. They could come with some data and ebd of the day they will get the result that this transaction is a Farud transaction or a valid transaction . I was able to get the model to predict the Fare Price with 100% accuracy after minimal tuning.

item.title: Flight Ticket Price Prediction
item.description: Created a tool that estimates the Flight ticket price . Collect the data from Open Source Claned tha data for Creating a good model . Optimized Linear, Lasso, and Random Forest Regressors using GridsearchCV to reach the best model. Built a client facing API using flask Deployed in Heroku Platform URL GitHub Repositories: click here Live : click here
